_xResult.title: Hag White Linen Gauze Top
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made sheer linen blouse with flowing silhouette
_xResult.longdesc:
This custom made top conveys beauty, power, elegance, and poise. Wave your arms in the air and allow yourself to be light and carefree, knowing that you look utterly incredible. Knowing that you feel utterly invincible. 

 

This gorgeous creation is made of 100% gauze linen fabric and has been pre-washed and softened so that it will not shrink anymore.

 

Shantima uses Oeko-Tex certified 100% European linen fabrics which guarantees that it meets human - ecological requirements.

properties.propvalue: Hand wash only with soft washing agents. No ironing required to maintain relaxed and wrinkled texture.
